resources.string: Today No Meeting Scheduled/May Completed Already

1.App Version 1.5

 2.JDialer App is for joining Conference call
		 from the Android mobile. 

 3.App can be installed from the android 
			Version 5.0(Lollipop).

 4.Android Device Calendar Must Sync With
		 OutLook Calendar.

 5.After installing open the app, it will
		 ask for the calendar read permission,
		 please allow the permission.

 note: if you deny the permission then app
					 will not read any data from the
					 calendar

 6.If you denied the permission then please
		 reinstall and open the app and allow the
		 permission to read

 7.These permissions are system level
		 security permission must be allowed only
		 at once on the beginning of the particular
		 feature to use. It will not ask next time
		 until you reinstall the app

 8.After giving permission app will read your
		 calendar and will list all your current day
		 meeting

 9.Each meeting details contains Title, Time,
		 Date, Online meeting dialer number and
		 the conference ID

 10.To join the meeting dial the meeting by
			 clicking the dialer symbol green button

 11.While dialing app will asks for the call
		 permission (system level permission must
		 be allowed) will asks only once at the
		 first time. It will not ask for the next time
		 until you reinstall the app

 12.After allowing the permissions, system
		 has set the app to be ready to use the
		 dialer feature from the app

 13.Now the Dialer permission and calendar
		 read permission is set and ready to be
		 used in our app

 14.App having options to Exit to quite the
			 app

 15.App having Reset options to reset App
			 when we change the time Zone From One
			 country to Another.

 16.If Time zone is changed from one time
			 one Another by Traveling Or By
			 manually,App will convert the meeting to
			 respective time zoone timings.and we
			 need to sync.

 17.We can join as leader if the meeting
			 contains the Leadership PIN and the
			 dialer button will be in the blue color.

 18.For the same meeting you can join as
			 the participant by pressing no when it
			 asks for the Leadership PIN. and just
			 record your name and join the meeting.

1.We Can Join Conference Meeting
				 Through Phone.
 
		 2.We Can Join As Leader and Participient.
 
		 3.App Can adjust to time zone if we
				 Change the time zone.
